about.introduction: Hello! I'm Guilherme Cirelli Lopes, a Systems Analysis and Development student, known for being hardworking and honorable in keeping my promises. My goal is to help entrepreneurs and professionals like you transform ideas into successful digital projects, with scalable, modern and functional solutions.

services.title: What can I do for your project?
items: Development of responsive and modern websites that highlight your products or services.
Creation of customized web applications, with integrated Front-End and Back-End.
Optimization and deployment on platforms like Netlify and Vercel, ensuring performance and stability.
Structuring efficient systems using Node.js, SQL, ReactJS and NextJS.
Organized documentation and clear communication, facilitating teamwork and future maintenance.

timeline.title: Beginning in Systems Analysis and Development
timeline.description: Started my academic journey in the ADS degree program, learning the essential fundamentals: programming logic, algorithms, and data structures. Discovered how computers really work, from binary systems to networks.

timeline.title: First Steps in Web Development
timeline.description: Dove into the world of web development, learning HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Created my first websites and discovered the importance of Git for teamwork. Focused on making pages that work well on any device.

timeline.title: Exploring Web Development
timeline.description: Deepened my knowledge by creating more complex projects. Learned to work with APIs, improve user experience, and take first steps with Node.js in back-end. Each project brought new challenges and learnings.

timeline.title: Starting at A.Yoshii Engenharia
timeline.description: Secured my first professional opportunity as an IT Assistant. Here, I put my knowledge into practice, helping to keep systems running and solving real IT infrastructure problems.

timeline.title: Building Complete Solutions
timeline.description: Dedicated myself to creating web applications from scratch, combining front-end and back-end. Worked with Next.js and Node.js, always thinking about code quality and user experience. Each project taught me something new about professional development.

timeline.title: Learning through Mentorship
timeline.description: Started a personalized mentorship program to enhance my web development skills. Learning industry best practices and building real projects with Next.js, React, and Node.js.

timeline.title: Building My Future
timeline.description: Working on my portfolio and personal projects, putting everything I've learned into practice. Looking to contribute to the open source community and continuing to learn new technologies and development methods.
